creditline: Gift of Dr. and Mrs. William K. Gamble
description: relief carving of three standing figures (2 with musical inbstruments, one with a chicken and a jug); 2 kneeling figures
image_copyright: Copyright of the artist%2C artist%27s estate%2C or assignees.
text: L.O. Fakeye is a trained Yoruba sculptor from the Nigerian city of Ibaden.  While this carving of a traditional ceremony of sacrifice illustrates an on-going Yoruba practice, the work was made for sale to the western collector's market.
title: Untitled (village scene)
